Articles.Content:
273. Remove timewarp please, it's unrealistic and makes the game no fun! It's not like interplanetary flights take days; going to the Mun (not that I've gone anywhere else) only took fifteen minutes!

I remember saying the same thing on this thread...

Anyway...

274. (complimenting #52 and #273) 1:1 PLANETS! THIS SOLAR SYSTEM LOOKS SMALL! TOO UNREALISTIC! I WANT IT TO TAKE MORE THAN AN HOUR TO REACH ORBIT FROM THE SURFACE!

275. IF THE DEVS WON'T ALLOW IT THEN JUST ALLOW US TO MOD THE PLANETS OURSELVES!

Edited May 15, 2013 by Flixxbeatz
Added #275

2 I want a teapot floating between Kerbin and Duna

But can you prove that there isn't one already?

276. Rules saying that NOOBS AREN'T ALLOWED HERE!

(I'm just joking. We should really try to teach the noobs about how to play the game.)
277. I still think it should be Kearth, Kol etc...

278. I want a search function for the forums that lists all made suggestion 'cauze I am too lazy to search them my self

/irony

/sarcasm

89) When is the release date for the next update

That's what I was thinking, when's the next "update"
279 . Have a ion engine with the thrust of a mainsail with 1 Xenon and electricity consumption per hour.

280. Make enormous Fueltanks that can carry ridicoulus amounts of fuel without being heavy at all.

281. A button to stop Gravity so rockets don't fall out of the sky after fuel is burnt and before orbit is achieved.
282: KSP on iPhone and Android please.

283: An extremely detailed base building system involving the entire spacecraft production tree, including mining ores, pumping up oils and other liquids, and compressing gasses. This would come with a detailed fuel mixing and engine creation editor, as well as a wind-tunnel for testing the aerodynamic forces on spacecraft and spaceplanes. You can build multiple launch pads and schedule launches and construction times for rockets. Facility upgrades can be made including building barracks, power plants, mining facilities, oil drilling platforms, research facilities, public outreach buildings, and vehicle assembly buildings. In order to keep the program running you must appeal to its political oversight, mostly by meeting deadlines and completing challenges to inspire the public.

284: A special viewing system allowing you to watch your engineers assemble your spacecraft in real time (with excessively detailed animations).

285: Get interviewed by the kerbal media!
286 Shotguns for Kerbals, so they can go hunting

282: KSP on iPhone and Android please.

I loled hard, i was really wishing for something like that so I could build rockets on my way to work XD

(but at least I did know not to suggest it XD)

286 Shotguns for Kerbals, so they can go hunting

287. LASER shotguns for Kerbals.
288. An orbital space-Piano for Kerbals to play on in vacuum.

289. telling a previous poster to read the wiki

it is just as improbable as true multiplayer.
290. Make kerbin earth size

286 Shotguns for Kerbals, so they can go hunting

Makes me think of the firespitter plane cockpit with ammo in it. The kerbals probably had no clue what it did.

"These bullets aren't chocolate!. These are inedible, what good are they?"

291.

Sonic screwdrivers for kerbals. Why should they ever need any other tools?
I know this thread is supposed to be satirical... But god dammit, it makes me groan. Couldn't read past page 3 before wanting to throw my keyboard through the internet at some of you.
292. A Hydro-spanner
293: Kerbal Space Program Kerbal Space Edition...

291. Sonic screwdrivers for kerbals. Why should they ever need any other tools?

I love this idea! But I cringe at the thought of how much the BBC would want in license fees.

294) Tactical laser monkeys.

Edited May 18, 2013 by Guest

293: Kerbal Space Program Kerbal Space Edition...

295. Kerbal Space Program: The Core

296. Kerbal Space Watersports

297. Kerbal Space Program Military Edition
298 Only rovers? Why not walkers?
299. Kerbals dance in their vehicles along with any music you're playing at the moment.
300.) Can I have a giant statue of myself on every single planet
